name: Wings (itch) (Ysopprod)
description:
Check out my YouToube channel for DevLogs and other GameDev related stuff 😍

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKsO3tjZNcKtRTYfhv-rQuA

How to play Wings:

  • Controll bird with wasd/arrow keys
  • Flap wings with space
  • Collect green balls to grow and get smaller by flapping wings
